metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2620 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 15.1 prior to 15.11.10, all versions from 16.0 prior to16.0.6, all versions from 16.1 prior to 16.1.1. A maintainer could modify awebhook URL to leak masked webhook secrets by manipulating other maskedportions. This addresses an incomplete fix for CVE-2023-0838.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
